ack.p: We would like to thank Thibaut Jombart and Rich Fitzjohn from the R Epidemics Consortium (RECON; http://www.repidemicsconsortium.org) for guidelines and advice on development of R-packages for analysing epidemics. The research was performed in partnership with Public Health England (PHE). The views expressed are those of the author(s) and not necessarily those of the NHS, the NIHR, the Department of Health or Public Health England.
